main event: A slow-moving, brilliant high-altitude object observed in Uruguay, estimated to be the size of a saucer, moving with a motion like a saucer skipping on water.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at night around 21:00 or 22:28 and lasted for 10-15 minutes,The object changed color and was very bright,It was seen above the clouds with no haze,There was speculation it could be a balloon observation but no definitive conclusions were made,The observer noted the object exhibited both descent and ascent during the observation.
